Reviews.Title: Swann SWADS-15MBNC-GL Swann Video and 50-Feet Power BNC Cable for CCTV
Reviews.Author: J. Phillips
Reviews.Content: Swann SWADS-15MBNC-GL Swann Video and 50-Feet Power BNC Cable for CCTVOrdered on line because it is cheaper than Radio S@@@

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: Secure Video
Reviews.Content: These cables are heavy duty and work great. I would buy these cables again as the white color blends with walls and exterior paint.

Reviews.Title: The cable worked fine
Reviews.Author: Joseph Simonowich
Reviews.Content: We needed some extra cable to hook up our camera to a dvr security system and this cable was compatible.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Sommay Vorachak
Reviews.Content: I got more than I expected, durable and well made product.  I was very happy to receive this cables 2 days after I ordered.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to connect co-ax extension cable
Add 50ft/15m of distance to your security system
Tight locking, secure & can't accidently disconnect
75 ohm, double shielded & weather resistant to withstand harsh conditions
Send power to your camera via this cable
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWADS-15MBNC-GL  Swann Video and 50-Feet  Power BNC Cable  for CCTV Camera (White)
